website_summaries.verdict: Fits a variety of body sizes, making it suitable for athletes of all levels.
pros: Customers rave about the fit and feel of this wetsuit engineered for a myriad of body types
Details went into designing for all types of athletic body types
cons: Fits extremely well, however may need extra attention when choosing the appropriate size

customer_reviews.title: Great fit
customer_reviews.text: Im a six foot tall, 225lb man with an athletic weight lifters build. I have a 50in chest and a 36in waist. Its very difficult for me to find anything that fits correctly. The L2 wetsuit fits perfect and doesnt choke me (18 1/2 in neck) or restrict any movement. I can't say enough how pleased i am not only with the fit, but also the comfort and performance of this wetsuit.
customer_reviews.author: David Seeley

customer_reviews.title: Great size options, chart is spot on
customer_reviews.text: I'm 6ft, 175lbs with a long torso, thick legs and 42" chest. I bought the ML size based on Synergy fit chart, and thus far it seems perfect. I was on the edge of sizes in most other beginning brands and suits, and the Synergy size options, tech features and affordability were top drivers for purchasing this item. It's new, but so far so good!
customer_reviews.author: RenaissanceMan

customer_reviews.title: Great wetsuit
customer_reviews.text: It ran a little big for me. I wish it fit because its a terrific entry-level wetsuit. I wish I could have found the correct size because this was a really comfortable and affordable solution.
customer_reviews.author: Scott Krotee

customer_reviews.title: Well Made - no complaints.
customer_reviews.text: I originally bought the fullsleve wetsuit because was swimming in the NorthWest lakes in April. I loved the wetsuit so much I purchased the sleeveless version for summer triathlons. I competed in 1 Tri and have another coming up in 3 weeks. Suit is reliable, and more sturdy that I thought it would be. In transitions I don't "rip" it off, but it comes off easy enough.
customer_reviews.author: Tyler Lindsey

customer_reviews.title: I am 5' 8" -- average weight -- 172-180 -- ...
customer_reviews.text: I am 5' 8" -- average weight -- 172-180 -- short legs and long torso, and a lot more muscular than most men my size. I would benefit from one size larger than I ordered. However, this is a major improvement from my long sleeve (one size larger, than this sleeveless) suit. I didn't feel restricted in my swim.
customer_reviews.author: O.M.M.D

customer_reviews.title: First wetsuit, WOW!
customer_reviews.text: Just got a chance to try it out today, all I can say is WOW! SO much better than pull buoy or whatever other janky stuff I tried to keep my legs up so I could work my upper body. I don't ever want to do a warm water tri again, it's that much better.
customer_reviews.author: R. Snow

customer_reviews.title: It felt like it fit perfect and was really tight on land ...
customer_reviews.text: I am 6'3" 190lbs with Larger shoulders and chicken legs. I went to Synergy's sizing chart and originally ordered size L1. It felt like it fit perfect and was really tight on land but when used it for my first swim water was coming in through the bottom and filling the legs of the wet-suit. I was able to size down to the M3 which drastically reduced this issue but I still felt small flutters of water a few times in my first swim with the m3. Overall it is good for the money. Very quick and easy to pull off and movement is great!
customer_reviews.author: Brady

customer_reviews.title: Good wet suit for the money
customer_reviews.text: I have used this wet suit for two triatholons so far and a number of weekly swims. It has held up well and fits perfectly. The slick skin design also makes me a little faster.
customer_reviews.author: Jacob Stevens

customer_reviews.title: Fits like a a fine glove as if it were custom ...
customer_reviews.text: Fits like a a fine glove as if it were custom made. Only draw back is better quality material as in Synergy's higher end/costly triathlon swim suits should of been incorporated in the Endorphin. Lake and ocean swimming in relatively mild to warm to hot weather its a dream to swim in.
customer_reviews.author: Nicholas Bohurjak

customer_reviews.title: 5'11" 165lbs - M2 Fits
customer_reviews.text: Had to return size M1. 5'11" 165lbs - M2 Fits
customer_reviews.author: Taylor F

customer_reviews.title: Excellent bouyancy and great arm mobilty for freestyle/open water swimming
customer_reviews.text: A bit snug...length is very accurate. Excellent bouyancy and great arm mobilty for freestyle/open water swimming in lake when it's cold.
customer_reviews.author: PoorPWR

customer_reviews.title: Nice fit
customer_reviews.text: Fits perfectly and does a great job in cold water
customer_reviews.author: Pamela Cohen

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I was hoping for
customer_reviews.text: Only used it once so far (sprint try), but seems like a very well-made suit & extremely comfortable. I'm 6'5" 185# and the L1 size fits me great -- definitely snug, but that's what I want for racing & it doesn't bind up at all. I originally ordered the M3 size that was definitely too tight, but the return process was very easy (minus return shipping). Overall I like the suit a lot, very happy with the quality for the $$.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good suit
customer_reviews.text: This is the first wetsuit I've worn. I feel there is a pocket of space in the torso, but it could be that I ordered the wrong size. Should have sized down one. I'm 5'7", around 157 and I have size M1.
customer_reviews.author: Ivan Morales

customer_reviews.title: Great wetsuit. I'm 5'8" and 156 lbs and ordered ...
customer_reviews.text: Great wetsuit. I'm 5'8" and 156 lbs and ordered a MEDIUM (M1), but it was too small. I also ordered a Synergy long sleeve MEDIUM, and it fitted perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Jerry Joubert

customer_reviews.title: Great wetsuit for all levels
customer_reviews.text: This is a great wetsuit for both beginner and experienced triathletes. I am a fairly muscular 6ft - 185 and the M3 fits perfectly. Easy getting off in transition. Buoyancy is excellent.
customer_reviews.author: Neil Falkenhan

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: Runs small and the bottom of suit ripped while putting it on, not stitched at bottom.
customer_reviews.author: Steve Russell

customer_reviews.title: Very good suit, runs smaller in sizes
customer_reviews.text: Although I used the sizing charts exactly based on my height and weight, I still needed to get a size higher. Went from S3 to M1. Overall a very good suit
customer_reviews.author: Spartabookworm

customer_reviews.title: Great wetsuit! No Swim Cap?
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my first 70.3. Used size chart and it fit great! Used it last weekend for training and it was awesome. I was so hoping to get the yellow Synergy swim cap. I saw it on the picture with wetsuit. Would have been great to rock the yellow being its one of my favorite colors.
customer_reviews.author: Viviana Figueroa

customer_reviews.title: One of the best purchases you can make if you swim/train in cold ...
customer_reviews.text: 1st swimsuit ever purchased. Fits perfectly and is extremely warm in cold waters. Your arms feel free to move while your chest area is snug and very warm. One of the best purchases you can make if you swim/train in cold oceans or lakes. 5/5 and now purchasing 3 for my kids!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It's an excellent wet suit in the water
customer_reviews.text: It's an excellent wet suit in the water, but unfortunately I already have two major tears in it after only a couple of months.
customer_reviews.author: Bill Me

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fit which is hard for me to do with ...
customer_reviews.text: Perfect fit which is hard for me to do with my body shape. The neck is great as it is not tight, room to move with out feeling restricted.
customer_reviews.author: kim

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: Very good wetsuit for the price. not as fragile as the TYR. I would recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: My first Wetsuit- I am pleased
customer_reviews.text: so this is my first wetsuit i purchased for my first triathlon coming up. It is in lake michigan, so it is definitely needed. i got it for a good price, which is important because i don't know if i will be doing anymore. and it seems well made- the fit was just right (i am tall, slim with wide shoulders- picked M3 and it fits well). I did try on another wetsuit that seemed the same and it cost 2x as much. i did try on another wetsuit that was also more, but it seemed heavier and didn't fit as well. based on my experience, i would recommend buying this.
customer_reviews.author: Machead

customer_reviews.title: Great wetsuit! and very comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Great wetsuit! and very comfortable! It arrived ahead of schedule
customer_reviews.author: RAUL VELEZ

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This is a fantastic wetsuit. Followed the size chart and it fit perfectly!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I have this suit in women's and it's perfect. Easy to put on and take off
customer_reviews.text: I have this suit in women's and it's perfect. Easy to put on and take off. However, I ordered this for my husband and he couldn't get it on. He's at the small end of the size chart for this suit but it was just WAY TOO SMALL.
customer_reviews.author: melaina marion

customer_reviews.title: excellent suit
customer_reviews.text: I've only got to swim in this suit once so far, but it performed very well. The fit was perfect according to the sizing chart (I got an L2 and I am about 6'4 250). The suit didn't collect any water, and it has the perfect amount of flotation while keeping the shoulder free to rotate. The only minor drawback is that I have sort of a hard time putting it on by myself, but I think that just comes with the territory of it being a good fit.
customer_reviews.author: Jeffrey Limbird

customer_reviews.title: Excellent fit and well insulated for race day!
customer_reviews.text: After very careful study of the sizing charts, my wetsuit fits perfectly. My shoulders are broad and I wanted full upper body freedom so the sleeveless version is the right call. No bunching or looseness to minimize chafing. Search Synergy Endorphin on youtube and you'll find feature highlights as well as a great "how to put it on" clip. Highly recommended for all who will race in cold water...
customer_reviews.author: Steffen Low

customer_reviews.title: I'm 6'2" and 165lbs. The sizing chart said to ...
customer_reviews.text: I'm 6'2" and 165lbs. The sizing chart said to get the M2 so I originally ordered it but it was too small. The legs went halfway up my calves and I had to suck in and have someone help me zip it up. The M3 fits me well but I do notice a little water leaking into the legs from the ankles.
customer_reviews.author: Blind Goat

customer_reviews.title: I ordered per the sizing chart and it fits as recommended. Really looking forward to using this in competition
customer_reviews.text: I'm really impressed by the quality of this wetsuit. Every aspect says quality. I ordered per the sizing chart and it fits as recommended. Really looking forward to using this in competition. Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: the fit is awesome. I dont have that tight binding feel
customer_reviews.text: the fit is awesome.I dont have that tight binding feel.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: Synergy Triathlon Wetsuit 5/3mm - Men's Endorphin Sleeveless Long John Smoothskin Neoprene for Open Water Swimming Ironman & USAT Approved
feature_bullets: SUITABLE FOR ALL LEVELS – Ironman & USAT approved. Athlete endorsed. Comes in wide range of sizes to ensure a perfect fit.
PROVEN TECHNOLOGY EQUALS SUPERIOR PERFORMANCE – Hydrodynamic neoprene made from Yamamoto #39 with SCS silicone coated SyPrene. 5mm thick core buoyancy panel / 3mm lower legs and back.

EXCEPTIONAL FUNCTIONALITY – Full range of motion. Unsurpassed 680 percent flexibility. Highest grade anti corrode internal wetsuit zipper from YKK which greatly reduces drag as you move through the water. Super soft low neck with smoothskin on both sides and because it is so soft, it feels like you hardly have anything around your neck.

MAXIMUM BUOYANCY - 5mm wetsuit, which is the maximum buoyancy allowed in triathlon wetsuits. Creates nearly double the buoyancy than 3mm suits, which are not recommended for cold waters. Float higher. Move faster. Save energy.

CUSTOMER SATISFACTION - 30-Day Guarantee: If you are not 100% satisfied within 30-days, send your new/unused wetsuit back for a full refund / 2 Year Warranty / Lifetime Replacement Guarantee (allows end-user to send in their used wetsuit at any time and receive 40% off MSRP).

specifications.Customer Reviews: /** Fix for UDP-1061. Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
